Module Contents

.. py:function:: upMean(*, geometry: libICEpost.src.engineModel.EngineGeometry.ConRod.ConRodGeometry, time: libICEpost.src.engineModel.EngineTime.EngineTime.EngineTime) -> float

   Compute the mean piston speed of a piston engine.

   :param geometry: The engine geometry
   :type geometry: EngineGeometry.ConRod.ConRodGeometry
   :param time: The engine time
   :type time: EngineTime.EngineTime.EngineTime

   :returns: mean piston speed
   :rtype: float
